DataElement.preferredDefinition: A substance or portion of material originally obtained from a biological entity for use in testing, examination, or study. EXAMPLE(S): A serum sample from blood. The textual representation of the material.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._A statement or an account describing something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Concepts.definition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.
The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Property.preferredDefinition: A statement or an account describing something.

Concepts.definition: A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Character string datatype stands for text data.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
